title._content: Image taken from page 386 of 'Liber Fluviorum; or, River Scenery of France. Depicted in sixty-one line engravings from drawings by J. M. W. Turner ... With descriptive letter-press by Leitch Ritchie; and a biographical sketch by Alaric A. Watts'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Liber Fluviorum; or, River Scenery of France. Depicted in sixty-one line engravings from drawings by J. M. W. Turner ... Bohn Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003110248 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
